title: Chocolate reflection cake
description: A dazzling cake that's perfect for any celebration. The cake itself is easy to make, so you can put your efforts into the icing glaze. Equipment: You will need 2 loose-bottomed cake tins, 20cm/8in wide.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz baking spread, plus extra for greasing
300ml/10fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff peaks form
